Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "description":(\{ "You tailor your cape into NEW_OBJECT", "tailors a cape into NEW_OBJECT" \}), "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:tailoring-cape" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:tailoring-cape" \}) \}), "newobject-properties":(\{ (\{ "trait:color", "trait:color" \}), (\{ "trait:material", "trait:material" \}) \}), "skill":"tailoring", "stopvalue":(\{ "trait:brief", "cape", "This cape has already been tailored." \}) ])
"This is a sleeveless outer garment which is designed to fasten at the throat and fall down the back of the wearer. It falls only partially down the back, and drapes elegantly over the shoulders."
